Package edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces

Interface Action

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddBalanceAction, AddBookingAction, ConfirmAction, DisplayBookingAction, ExitAction, RemoveBookingAction, ViewBalanceAction
public interface Action

Action

This interface serves as a contract for classes that implement Action. Allows classes to perform specific actions on a particular object or displaying to terminal
Since:
04/04/2024

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    String
    execute(User user, BookingSystem bookingSystem)
    The execute method contains all the logic needed to perform the actual action,
    String
    menuDescription()
    Serves for the action itself to contain the information about how it will be shown as an option in a text-based Menu.

  • Method Details

    • execute

      String execute(User user, BookingSystem bookingSystem)
      The execute method contains all the logic needed to perform the actual action,
      Parameters:
      user - the current user in system
      bookingSystem - current BookingSystem used for the system
      Returns:
      a String that represents a message to inform end-user and to be displayed in console

    • menuDescription

      String menuDescription()
      Serves for the action itself to contain the information about how it will be shown as an option in a text-based Menu.
      Returns:
      a String that represents a display message in menu option screen
